title: Give Grace (with Michael Tubbs)
description:
DeRay, Kaya, De'Ara, and guest Myles E. Johnson cover the underreported news of the week. Then, DeRay interviews Michael Tubbs, author of "The Deeper the Roots."


For a transcript of this episode, please visit crooked.com/podsavethepeople.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
